item.description:
Come on out and join me at The Emerald Rose for some great food and music and watch the Red Sox as well!! I will be performing my original songs at 7PM. There is no cover charge.

The Emerald Rose has specialty drinks including the Fruit Salad drink and every beer you can imagine.
They also have everything ranging from Irish dishes to American dishes including seafood. Their reviews are great and the atmosphere hospitable.

I play pop, rock and alternative originals and I write most of my songs. My music is about having a positive outlook on life. This show I will be performing an acoustic set so for those who haven't seen me, I will be taking a different slant on things. I try to write with the intent of helping people from all walks of life get past their fears and accomplish satisfaction in their lives. If I can reach people through my music, I believe I am helping my fans one by one. Please feel free to visit my website at Jodi Griffith


The Emerald Rose is conveniently located off a couple of miles of I-95 or I-93, just past the Burlington line in Billerica. If anyone needs a ride, please feel free to e-mail me through meetup and I can arrange a carpool.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess where the meetup group is meeting and she will direct you to me
item.name: Food, Drinks, Jodi Griffith Live Music at The Emerald Rose (Watch Sox Game too)
